Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects on potential prey mammals of providing diversionary feeding for predators. This study was in Canada.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Survival (1 study): A controlled, before-and-after study in CanadaÂ found that diversionary feeding of predators appeared to increase woodland caribou calf survival.

BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
